altername_name: The Birds and the Bees II
The Birds and the Bees II: Antics
name: Antics
overview: Boris Bee, hero of "THE BIRDS AND THE BEES", has been set upon by a vicious gang of ants and locked away, somewhere within their nest, to await a terrible fate. Fortunately for Boris, help is at hand in the shape of his cousin, Barnabee who is about to launch a daring rescue mission. You control Barnabee as he searches the labyrinthine ants nest in search of his missing friend. Can you rescue Boris and guide him back to the safety of his hive, or will you perish underground?
